pull.title: tx pool: Avoid passing redundant hash into addUnchecked (scripted-diff)
pull.body:
Several years ago the transaction hash was not cached. For optimization the hash was instead passed into `addUnchecked` to avoid re-calculating it. See f77654a0e9424f13cad04f82c014abd78fbb5e38

Passing in the hash is now redundant and the argument can safely be removed.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13922 (Lower default relay fees by ajtowns)
* #13793 (tx pool: Use class methods to hide raw map iterator impl details by MarcoFalke)
* #13558 (Drop unused GetType() from CSizeComputer by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Looks like the scripted-diff is failing because of the other whitespace/formatting changes also included in 8c9d589.

events.message: Mark CTxMemPoolEntry members that should not be modified const
tx pool: Use the entry's hash instead of the one passed to addUnchecked

verification.payload:

author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1532956273 -0400
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1532956172 -0400

scripted-diff: Remove unused first argument to addUnchecked

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
git grep -l addUnchecked | xargs sed --regexp-extended -i -e 's/addUnchecked\([^)][^,]+,\s*/addUnchecked(/g'
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

events.message:

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-

rename.from: tx pool: Avoid passing redundant hash into addUnchecked
rename.to: tx pool: Avoid passing redundant hash into addUnchecked (scripted-diff)

events.body: This is split off of #13804, but not required. So if people hate this kind of refactoring, I am happy to drop it.
utACK fa58777. I like the change, passing entry is now enough. Could update OP now that #13786 is merged.

utACK fe5c49766c0dc5beaf186d77b568361242b20d5e
removing the redundancy is good because it avoids a potential bug when passing in the wrong hash
